WRITING.TITLE: fav/best distrubeted canned/bottled beers from DFW
WRITING.TEXT: Just moved to DFW 2 months ago. I've tried Shiner and Deep Elm so far. what are other Texas brands that i can buy from a liquor store that you guys would recommend?

WRITING.TITLE: Pc network technician program
WRITING.TEXT: So would you guys suggest a 16 week Pc network technician program at my local college. It's a 16 week class with CompTIA A+ and Network+ certification exams at the end. would this be a good step to jumpstart my career? link: https://www.tccd.edu/academics/cie/workforce-training/career-technical-programs/pc-network-technician/

WRITING.TITLE: [NeedAdvice] i dont like to challenge myself
WRITING.TEXT: It's true. The areas in my life I'm trying to improve in I work at but I never really challenge myself to much. For instance I started running a couple months ago. I got 2 miles in under 20min then quit because it got hard. now I just workout 10-15mins day. Another example, I'm learning how to do coding(HTML,CSS, etc) on my own, when it starts getting really challenging I stop and relearn easy stuff. Also Ive been playing guitar for 10+ years and while I work at it, when things get hard I get mad and stressed and go to something easier. I like to learn, but I like it to be comfortable and easy. Any feedback on how I can start pushing myself more?

WRITING.TITLE: I dont like too much of a challenge

WRITING.TEXT: That id be 24, single and working a minimum wage job with nothing to show for myself. Oh and that Trump is president
